text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ha… ha… This… this is not enough training…!

When I went to check up on Mejiro Mcqueen, I saw 
that she was still training intensively as usual.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
As a horsegirl bearing the proud Mejiro name, 
I cannot allow any more room for failure!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
This is not the time to be struggling 
with mustering strength into my legs…!!

I'm worried about her pushing herself so hard. 
Is she going to be okay…?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: ……H-huh? My body feels… weak…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ah…!!

Just when I thought I saw Mejiro Mcqueen staggering 
for a moment, she collapsed onto the ground!
Examination revealed that she had minor anemia.

The doctor said it could be due to a nutritional deficiency. 
Perhaps she is not eating properly……?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: McQueen! I heard you fell down, are you oka―

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Ah, I'm s-sorry!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Um… hello. My name is Mejiro Ryan.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Are you McQueen's trainer?
choice_data_list: I'm not officially in charge yet, though.
I'm not officially in charge yet, though.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
I see… But, I can see that you're looking out 
for McQueen. I am very grateful for that.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
By the way, did you find out what 
could have caused her to collapse?
I spoke to Mejiro Ryan about the diagnosis.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Anemia due to nutritional deficiencies, I see…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
I did have a feeling that she was pushing herself too hard 
because of the upcoming Selection Race… I should have 
spoken to her earlier…
choice_data_list:
You've been worried about McQueen 
all this time, haven't you?

You've been worried about McQueen 
all this time, haven't you?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: That's right. But in the end, I couldn't do anything to help…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
As you may have guessed from my name, I'm more or less 
a Mejiro horsegirl. Ah, but we are not sisters, though.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Because of that, McQueen and I have 
known each other since we were kids.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
This girl… she has an excessive sense of responsibility. 
Or rather, it's more like she's too hard on herself.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
… Even though Mcqueen is doing perfectly 
fine, without needing to do all that.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: … Oh no! I have to go now…!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Sorry, Trainer. Please excuse me!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Um… about Mcqueen, I leave her in your care.

Leaving those words behind, Mejiro Ryan 
hurriedly departed from the scene……
After a while, Mejiro Mcqueen regained consciousness.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Is that what happened…? 
So during training, I collapsed……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I deeply apologize for causing so much trouble, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: But I'm perfectly fine now! I will resume training immediately―
(Grrrrmble…)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ah…!?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
W-why of course! As a proud Mejiro horsegirl, all aspects 
of my daily life, including my diet, are meticulously organized!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
However, considering the Selection Race is coming up, 
I had implemented some minor dietary restrictions…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I only collapsed because I wasn't ready! I simply haven't 
been training hard enough every day!
choice_data_list: Could I see your meal plan?
Could I see your meal plan?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Huh…? Yes, that's fine with me…
I looked through Mejiro Mcqueen's meal plan.

Certainly, she is getting the minimum required nutrients, 
but is this really enough? It's possible this is why she is 
struggling with mustering strength into her legs…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
… How did you find the menu plan? 
I do believe there's nothing wrong with it…
choice_data_list: Isn't this meal plan a little too restrictive?
Isn't this meal plan a little too restrictive?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ah, t-that's……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Since you're so concerned about it, it 
would be insincere of me to hide it…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Okay, I will tell you. There is a reason… for that limitation.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: It's about my… constitution, so to speak…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: It kind of… gets overweight, just a little bit!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Even with an ordinary diet, I quickly put on weight.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I can't afford to show up to the Selection Race looking so 
undisciplined when I'm representing the Mejiro family!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: And that's why I was implementing dietary restrictions―

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
… But I concur collapsing would defeat the purpose. 
I will think of a countermeasure to put in place.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Please excuse me, I must take my leave now. Again, I am truly 
sorry for any inconvenience that I may have caused today.
And with that, Mejiro McQueen quickly left the scene.
